thing-type.label: BTZW125 Danalock v2 circle
thing-type.description: Danalock v2 circle<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<ul&gt<li&gtSmartlock for easy and fast installation on almost any door</li&gt <li&gtIncl. adjustable cylinder</li&gt <li&gtNo keys required, Operation via Danalock App / Z-Wave</li&gt </ul&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtTo add or include the Danalock into a Z-Wave network</p&gt <p&gtSet the controller in inclusion mode</p&gt <p&gtPush the switch once until you hear two beeps.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtTo exclude the Danalock out off the Z-Wave network</p&gt <p&gtSet the controller in inclusion mode</p&gt <p&gtPush the switch once until you hear two beeps.</p&gt

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Direction
parameter.description: Direction<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0 -&gt; The motor goes clockwise when latched</p&gt <p&gt1 -&gt; The motor goes counterclockwise when latched</p&gt</p&gt

options.option: The motor goes counterclockwise when latched

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Speed (Torque)
parameter.description: Speed (Torque)<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt1 -&gt; Slowest</p&gt <p&gt2 -&gt; Slow</p&gt <p&gt3 -&gt; (Default) Normal</p&gt <p&gt4 -&gt; Fast</p&gt <p&gt5 -&gt; Fastest</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: Mode
parameter.description: Mode<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0 -&gt; Stepper motor mode wave drive(power saving)</p&gt <p&gt1 -&gt; (Default) Stepper motor mode full drive(Normal)</p&gt <p&gt2 -&gt; Relay mode</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: Turn degrees
parameter.description: Turn degrees<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt(Default) Factor 10 turn degrees ( 1 = 10 degrees, 9 = 90 degrees etc.)</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: Auto Latch time
parameter.description: Auto Latch time<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtHow many seconds from the lock has been unlatched to it automatically should close again. If 0 then it is disabled.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_6_1
parameter.label: 6: Sound
parameter.description: Sound<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtEnable the beep sound from latch or unlatch operations</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: Battery Type
parameter.description: Battery Type<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt2 -&gt; Mains power, changing from and to mains power requires the Danalock to be excluded and included.</p&gt <p&gt0 -&gt; 3,6 Volt battery</p&gt <p&gt1 -&gt; (Default) 3.0 Volt battery.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_8_1
parameter.label: 8: Battery alarm
parameter.description: Battery alarm value<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtWhen the battery level is under this value, the device will notify user with a beep sound after latch or unlatch</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_9_1
parameter.label: 9: TurnAndGo
parameter.description: TurnAndGo<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtusing a optional rotation sensor. Latch&amp;Go on will turn automatically when manual turn is detected.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_10_1
parameter.label: 10: BrakeAndGoBack
parameter.description: Turn 75 degrees back after x seconds<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0 -&gt; (Default) Disabled</p&gt <p&gt1 to 15 -&gt; Seconds to brake. When used the lock will brake for x amount of seconds and then turn 75 degrees back. Made for special doors without door lever.(Only when unlatching).</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_11_1
parameter.label: 11: Async
parameter.description: Used if the lock is using an optional rotation sensor<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0 -&gt; (Default) Async off</p&gt <p&gt1 -&gt; Async on. Used if the lock is using an optional rotation sensor. When async is enabled the lock will auto calibrate if already unlatched and asked to Unlatch again (used for special door locks where the key turn is asynced from the inside nob.)</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_12_1
parameter.label: 12: ReportType
parameter.description: Door lock operation report type<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtDoor lock operation report type</p&gt <p&gt2 -&gt; No Door lock operation reports are sent unsolicited.</p&gt <p&gt0 -&gt; (Default) Simple supported by all controllers that support door locks.</p&gt <p&gt1 -&gt; Advanced, more specific reports through notification Command Class.</p&gt</p&gt
